QuestData.Title: Meet the Margrave
QuestData.Description:
Word of the runeblade has reached Margrave Krexus. He wishes to see it for himself.
With such a weapon by your side, you pose a threat that the other houses cannot ignore. Perhaps we can use that to our advantage.
But enough talk. Follow me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Present your runeblade to Margrave Krexus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Present your runeblade to Margrave Krexus in the necropolis Vortrexxis.
QuestData.RewardText: Show me this runeblade of yours, mortal.
